SiteContent: As a highly skilled and experienced Front-End Developer with over 9 years of expertise in modern web and mobile technologies, I aim to leverage my proficiency in React.js, Next.js, and Microsoft MVC to create scalable, user-focused applications. My objective is to contribute to dynamic projects where I can optimize performance, enhance user experiences, and drive impactful results for the organization. I am committed to continuous learning and collaboration to stay ahead of industry trends and deliver innovative solutions.

Experience.title: Freelance
achievements: Delivered 10+ client projects using Microsoft MVC 4.5 and C#, boosting application speed by 30%.
Increased client satisfaction by 20% through responsive and user-focused designs tailored to business requirements.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate React Native and Next.js for scalable mobile and web solutions.

Experience.title: IWT Digital Media Agency
achievements: Designed and developed robust web applications using Microsoft MVC and C#.
Optimized database performance and ensured integrity using SQL Server.
Worked closely with team members to deliver end-to-end solutions on time.

Hobby.content: I am a person who likes challenges and undertakes the most advanced projects for learning and commitment.
